Personalized Toothbrush Designer: Create an app that allows users to design their own custom toothbrush. Users can choose from various handle colors, bristle lengths, and shapes. The app can also offer personalized recommendations based on the user's dental needs and preferences.

Smart Toothbrush: Develop a toothbrush that uses AI technology to provide real-time feedback on brushing technique. The toothbrush can detect areas where the user is brushing too hard or not hard enough and provide vibrations or sounds to guide them. The toothbrush can also track brushing time and provide reminders to users to brush for the full recommended 2 minutes.

Toothbrush Sanitizer: Create a toothbrush sanitizer that uses UV light technology to kill bacteria on the toothbrush. This would provide an additional layer of hygiene for users, especially those with sensitive teeth or gums. The sanitizer can also be designed to fit in a bathroom cabinet or travel case for easy use while on-the-go.

Interactive Toothbrush: Develop a toothbrush that plays a game or provides educational content while the user brushes their teeth. The toothbrush can have a built-in speaker and motion sensors to detect when the user is brushing. The game or content can be customized based on the user's age and brushing habits.

Customizable Toothbrush Handle: Create a toothbrush with a customizable handle that can be personalized with different colors, designs, or patterns. This can be a fun way for users to express their personality and make brushing teeth more enjoyable. The handle can also be made of a durable material that can withstand regular cleaning and use.
